summary: An ordinance ratifying and confirming the loan in the sum of $175,000 and authorizing the issuance and sale of general negotiable interest bearing serial coupon bonds therefor in said sum for the purpose of providing funds to pay the cost of separation of grades at Youngstown Place and West Spokane Street in the City of Seattle, as submitted to the qualified electors (voters) under Ordinance No. 58739; providing for the levy and collection of taxes for the payment, etc.
